original_text: On the inside of the stand there was an opening that had a circular frame one cubit deep. This opening was round, and with its basework it measured a cubit and a half. Around its opening there was engraving. The panels of the stands were square, not round.
korean_text: 그 받침 수레 위로 들이켜 높이가 한 규빗 되게 내민 것이 있고 그 면은 직경 한 규빗 반 되게 반원형으로 우묵하며 그 나머지 면에는 아로새긴 것이 있으며 그 내민 판들은 네모지고 둥글지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: On the inside of the stand there was an opening
that had a circular frame one cubit deep
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 한 규빗 깊이의 둥근 테두리를 가지고 있었다

sentences.original_text: and with its basework it measured a cubit and a half
sentences.korean_translation: 그 기초와 함께 한 규빗 반의 크기를 측정되었다

sentences.original_text: Around its opening there was engraving
The panels of the stands were square
